reviewText: Love Cougar Town but would not play in the USA and no notice was given when I purchased, I had to return
our dvd player could NOT read it, so error & we could not watch it.  returned it.  dissappointing

I wasn't aware that all of the Cougar Town DVDs were not formatted for DVD players in the US.  It didn't specify that they were not playable in the US.  Unfortunately, I did not find this out until now.  Because I gave them as a gift.  Is there anything I can do about this?  Can I return them for an exchange?  This happened with another movie I purchased through Amazon.  The movie was called The Trip.  I ate that one, but I don't want seconds.  Wasn't that good.

If you buy this product, first read the fine print. This DVD only plays on European DVD players which plays in a different format that USA DVD players. And they will only let you return it if you don't open it. Now I have 4 seasons of Cougar Town that I can't watch and can't return. If you have an American DVD player

DO NOT ORDER THIS DVD!!!!
does not play in my local
Thank you luckily I have a DD DVD player that is multi zone I'm enjoying the DVDs

Very upset with this product. It was not posted when we purchased it, that it was a different region dvd. Very angry I spent $30 on something I cannot use. I love cougar town and was very excited to buy in a bundle. I should have just ordered separate.
